import sys

n, x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
l = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

d = 0
cnt = 0

for i in range(n):
    d += l[i]
    if d <= x:
        cnt += 1

print(cnt + 1)

import sys

n, x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
l = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

d = 0
cnt = 0

for i in range(n):
    d += l[i]
    if d <= x:
        cnt += 1

print(cnt + 1)

N, X = map(int, input().split())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 1
dist = 0
for i in range(N):
    dist += L[i]
    if dist <= X:
        cnt += 1
    else:
        break
print(cnt)

N, X = map(int, input().split())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))

    dist += L[i]
    if dist <= X:
        cnt += 1
    else:

import sys

n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
l = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

d = 0
cnt = 0

for i in range(n):
    d += l[i]
    if d <= x:
        cnt += 1

print(cnt + 1)


N, X = map(int, input().split())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 1
dist = 0
for i in range(N):
    dist += L[i]
    if dist <= X:
        cnt += 1
    else:
